description: This file defines a Python class WhatsAppTools that provides methods to interact with the WhatsApp Business API for sending text and template messages, both synchronously and asynchronously. It manages API credentials, constructs request data, and handles API responses and errors.

classes.name: WhatsAppTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for sending WhatsApp messages via the Facebook Graph API, supporting both sync and async operations.

methods.name: _get_headers
methods.description: Constructs headers for API requests, including authorization token.

methods.name: _get_messages_url
methods.description: Builds the URL endpoint for sending messages.

methods.name: _send_message_async
methods.description: Asynchronously sends a message to the WhatsApp API.

methods.name: _send_message_sync
methods.description: Synchronously sends a message to the WhatsApp API.

methods.name: send_text_message_sync
methods.description: Sends a text message synchronously to a WhatsApp user.

methods.name: send_template_message_sync
methods.description: Sends a template message synchronously to a WhatsApp user.

methods.name: send_text_message_async
methods.description: Sends a text message asynchronously to a WhatsApp user.

methods.name: send_template_message_async
methods.description: Sends a template message asynchronously to a WhatsApp user.
